title: Memoirs of a Captivity Among the Indians of North America
description: From childhood to the age of nineteen: with anecdotes descriptive of their manners and customs.  To which is added, some account of the soil, climate, and vegetable productions of the territory westward of the Mississippi.  Third edition.  London: Longman, Hurst, Bees, Orme, Brown and Green.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wayne H. MacFarlane
